cast.name: 吉尔伯特·阿代尔 Gilbert Adair

this_title: Outside the Window: Events in May 1968
introduction: This feature is the second featurette on the DVD for The Dreamers. It examines in more detail the French political climate in the spring of '68 and reveals the interrelationships between student protest and their political idealism and the plight of the French worker. Interestingly, it will be the trade unions that benefit most from this little twentieth century French Revolution.
chinese_title: Outside the Window: Events in May 1968
